channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6049] Ariba // Language configuration
item.description:
One specific customer wants to send us the language parameter with his XML request (fr, en).
Could you please implement a session language definition through the Ariba xml request?

<Request deploymentMode="production">
<PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
<Extrinsic name="User">JSILVA</Extrinsic>
<Extrinsic name="Lang">fr</Extrinsic>
…
</PunchOutSetupRequest>
</Request>

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The support of setting up the session language was added to the Ariba customer.

item.description: If a customer has a special prices we should not calculate any additional discount on promotion prices.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6040] SEO - Title optimization - distrelec.de
item.description:
Observations :

  • On product pages, manufacturer image use to link to the manufacturer pages
  • Now the destination url of the link on this image is broken.
    Exemple for this product :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Digital-Multimeter-TRMS-AC-6000-digits-600-VAC-600-VDC-10-ADC-Fluke-FLUKE-115-PROMO/p/11073128
    • Image destination url on webkit browser :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Digital-Multimeter-TRMS-AC-6000-digits-600-VAC-600-VDC-10-ADC-Fluke-FLUKE-115-PROMO/p/11073128 (200, same page)
    • Image destination url on Internet explorer :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Digital-Multimeter-TRMS-AC-6000-digits-600-VAC-600-VDC-10-ADC-Fluke-FLUKE-115-PROMO/p/ (500)

Impacts :

  • The functionality is out of order.
  • The functionality lead 40% of the user to a 500 error.

Demands :

Reconfigure the link, to lead to the manufacturer of the product.
example in here :
http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/Fluke/man_flu

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6036] DE - Pricing issue
item.description:
The product 18097656 has 3 different prices shown:

  • ProductDetail: 134.40
  • MiniCart: 183.20
  • Cart: 149.00

Listprice is 153,70 but shown is 134,40. The promo-price of 149.00 is only shown in the cart.

Requestor: Stockmann, Uwe <uwe.stockmann@distrelec.com>

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please investige & fix if on our side otherwise hand further to SAP-Team, thanks.

The problem is fixed and there are no issues on this.

The new price of 149 EUR has been sent with the file 20141215121848528, so it has been generated the 15th of december at around 12:18.
This ticket has been opened the 15th of december at around 11:29 and so the price was not yet exported from SAP to the webshop.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6006] CC-Payment not working with saved credentials
item.description:
Issue
Payment with creditcard is not working if saved credentials are used. Please investigate.

User: distrelec.testing+b2bHU@gmail.com
pw: distrelec
item.summary: CC-Payment not working with saved credentials

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please check, thx.
Status?

Hi Rafael,

Together with Ruben we identify that "Pay Now" Button has some javascript problem on click. Ruben is investigating it further for javascript error as it on front end side error.

Thanks

in this screen, the "creditcardholder" (Name on the credit card) is missing, that's why the form is not transmitted.
Investigating how we can get this name

BE task:

First of all, we need to add the parameter about the CreditCardHolder the same way as the rest of them. (EvoDistPaymentParamsStrategy.java)

paymentParameters.put("CCSelect", deuCSPaymentModeCode);
paymentParameters.put("PCNr", ccPaymentInfo.getNumber());
paymentParameters.put("PCNRBrand", deuCSPaymentModeCode);
paymentParameters.put("PCNRYear", ccPaymentInfo.getValidToYear());
paymentParameters.put("PCNRMonth", ccPaymentInfo.getValidToMonth());

The name of this parameter should be provided by EVO.

Please reassign to BE

Hi Ruben,

The value of the parameter was missing. I added on backend side and tested it. It's working fine now in the local env.

So the right fix has been applied.

Hi Rafael,

This is ready for testing.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5969] SEO - Sitemap - Exclusion File
item.description:
Observations :

  • As seen with Francesco, sitemap destination url are in several case not appropriate (http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4623?focusedCommentId=33423&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-33423)

Impacts :

  • If we provide wrong url to the crawler we will waste crawl time frame and index wrong url, which is not the idea of a sitemap.

Demands :

  • Provide the possibility to import a black list of url/ids to ban from sitemap export.

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Pierre,
What's the exact topic here and why do you have already added a fix version?

Hi Florian,

I was writing the description, it's here now.
I didn't touch the fix version.

Hi Pierre
i've implemented the black list logic for products, categories and manfuacturers.

There are 3 text files in which we can store the blacklisted enties per each websites. Here the description of each files:

  • blacklist_product.txt
  • blacklist_category.txt
  • blacklist_manufacturer.txt

There are configuration properties to be able to decide at runtime where these files are located.
The properties are the following:

  • sitemap.blacklist.file.product
  • sitemap.blacklist.file.category
  • sitemap.blacklist.file.manufacturer

By default the files are located in the sitemap root folder defined by the configuration property: websitemap.data.rootdir

The contend of each of these files must be compliant with the following pattern:

site_id;entity_code

For example:

distrelec_CH;1010101
distrelec_DE;1010101

These files are out of the version control, this means that must be configured for each environment and can be changed at runtime without the need of a new deploy.
Please give me the blacklisted entities for each website, so i can configure them

Wowwww great !!
I would need the last export of sitemap to create it.

previous comment - category pages = 41k
previous comment - 20% of the category url result into a "0 results page"
We have to expect 8k of ID per country for the blacklist
i've fixed the issue about the number of products.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5692] DE // Additional delivery time for "Streckenartikel"
item.description:
Germany needs to have a special logic for "Streckenartikel":
Delivery of external warehouses (Fast und Slow) : 3-4 Days (Streckenartikel)

Please only show this delivery time if it's not 0.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: As I said, we also have to display this different time for "Streckenartikel" separated from the "normal" shor/long delivery time in the frontend! Is this as expected or not?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4623] SEO - Sitemap Issues - Full sitemap + alternate language to provide
item.description:
Observations :

  • For every website on the hybris plateform we are using sitemaps (https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/156184?hl=en)
  • We host one index of sitemap (http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml) which list all the sitemaps (http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap1.xml.gz).
  • Those sitemap are respecting google sitemap index formating (https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/75712?rd=1&hl=en) and "general url" sitemaps formating (https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/183668?hl=en&ref_topic=6080646&rd=1).
    sample_sitemap_index.xml
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<sitemapindex xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
	<sitemap>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap1.xml.gz</loc>
		<lastmod>2014-09-30T03:49:22.642+02:00</lastmod>
	</sitemap>
</sitemapindex>
    sample_sitemap1.xml
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" >
	<url>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Isolation-%C3%B8-2-mm-weiss-Multi-Contact-KT2-F-withe/p/14048066</loc>
		<lastmod>2014-09-22</lastmod>
	</url>
</urlset>
  • We can find inside the current distrelec.ch sitemaps :
    • Product url for German language (http://www.distrelec.ch/de/*/p/idproduct : sitemap1~8.xml)
    • Category url for German language (http://www.distrelec.ch/de/*/*/*/*/c/cat-idcat : sitemap8.xml)
  • We don't provide the other major pattern of landing pages :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L1D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2-3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-D*-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/manufacturer/brand-name
  • 55% of the url proposed inside the sitemap lead to 302 redirections : http://www.distrelec.ch/de/PVC-Starkstromlitze,-H05-V-K-0,75-qmm-dbl----/p/90040410 -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/de/PVC-Starkstromlitze%2C-H05-V-K-0%2C75-qmm-dbl-kabeltronik---660107512/p/serviceplus/90040410
  • 50% of product url are "service +" products : serviceplus/90040410" class="external-link" rel="nofollow">http://www.distrelec.ch/de/PVC-Starkstromlitze%2C-H05-V-K-0%2C75-qmm-dbl-kabeltronik---660107512/p/serviceplus/90040410
  • Language alternatives of all the landing pages, are not proposed.
    GoogleBot crawl ratio on the language structure of our pages :

Impacts :

  • By providing incomplete or wrong information about our landing pages, we drastically limit the crawlers comprehension of our structure and the positive effect of sitemaps.

Demands :

  • Provide only those landing page type absolute path inside sitemaps :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L1D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2-3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L3D_idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-D*-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-M*-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-idcat
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/product-id
  • Don't provide :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/cms/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/cms/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/search
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/checkToggles
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/cart
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/checkout
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/my-account
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/login
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/import-tool
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/support
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/feedback
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/medias/sys_master/*.js
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/*.js
    • http://www.distrelec.ch//app/etc/local.xml
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/medias/sys_master/*.gz
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/gsitemap*.xml.gz
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/serviceplus/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/ServicePlusShop/*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/*/alsoBought*
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/*/recommendation*
      ...
  • All url provided must be final url (no redirections between).
  • Provide all the products but not the "/p/serviceplus/*" products.
  • Provide every language equivalent for every url, example with http://www.distrelec.ch/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509
    exemple_sitemap_language_alternate.xml
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset 
	xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9"
	xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
	<url>
		<lastmod>YYYY-MM-DD</lastmod>
		<loc>http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/c/cat-L1D_379509</loc>
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
			<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509" />
	</url>
</urlset>
  • Xml tags details
    Tag Description
    <urlset> Encloses all information about the set of URLs included in the Sitemap.
    <url> Encloses all information about a specific URL.
    <loc> Specifies the URL.
    <lastmod> The date the URL was last modifed, in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD format (time value is optional).
  • For data analitycs, sitemaps must be splitted by url pattern :
    Exemple :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_product_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L1D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L2D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L2-3D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-L3D_1.xml.gz
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat-D_1.xml.gz (put /c/cat-DC-id, /c/cat-DD-id, /c/cat-MG-id)
    http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_manufacturer_1.xml.gz
  • For crawlers comprehension, a sitemap file can contain no more than 50,000 URLs and must be no larger than 10MB when uncompressed.
    If it's the case, split the sitemap by 50k part and modify the suffix "_incremental-number" at every splited sitemap starting by "_1" for the first sitemap and "_2" for the second etc...
    Edit : The alternate data make the sitemap a lot heavier, to comply to the rule of no more than 50k and no more than 10MB, we will split them by 15k of url.
  • Every new sitemap generated must be indicated inside the sitemap index : http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Sitemap Issues - Full sitemap + alternate language to provide

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Francesco : I've add an introduction about the sitemaps, if you read it you will have a better understanding of the context.

Hi Pierre
i've generated a sitemap with the Top Categories and with the alternate languages.
Could you please check the file attached?

The file has been generated for CH site only.
I'm checking, thx !

It start to look very nice !

In yellow the highlighted small dev server display bug :

  • Don't forget the "www"
  • /en/german-content is not good
  • the xdefault url miss a / between the domain and the url path inside the alternate
  • xml indentation of the xhtml:link tag
  • test domain
For the new sitemap version, the sitemap split per url pattern won't be implemented (too short on time). It will done in a second time.
(all issue fixed)
So that means we can set this task on resolved?

No, it's still in developement.
"(all issue fixed)" was about the previous comment.

Francesco will assign the status resolved when it will be.

Hi Pierre,
i've created a separate branch (feature-fbe-4623-seo-sitemap) for this issue.
In this way we can test this issue separately on the Atos Quality system without affecting the live system

Today i'll try to deploy on Atos Q
Ok, perfect thanks !

Hi Pierre
today i've realized that the requirement you've defined about the file names is very difficult to implement.
My proposal is to implement the creation of the sitemap files like this:

http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_product_1.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_product_2.xml.gz

http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_1.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_2.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_cat_3.xml.gz

http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_manufacturer_1.xml.gz
http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_manufacturer_2.xml.gz

What is really hard to get is the categories splitted in files based on the category level.

If the category split is to complex for now, we can come back after as we said.

(I am testing on http://test.a.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml right now)

Chek on http://test.a.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml :

1) All the product alternate have german url. Is it possible to provide the final url with the dedicated language description ?

sitemap 11
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" >
  <url>
    <loc>http://test.a.distrelec.ch/Gabelkoppler-2-mm-50-mA-30-V-20-mA--25-%2B85-%C2%B0C-Omron-EE-SX1018/p/17540628</loc>
    <lastmod>2014-08-20</lastmod>
    <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/de/Gabelkoppler-2-mm-50-mA-30-V-20-mA--25-%2B85-%C2%B0C-Omron-EE-SX1018/p/17540628" /> 
    <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/fr/Gabelkoppler-2-mm-50-mA-30-V-20-mA--25-%2B85-%C2%B0C-Omron-EE-SX1018/p/17540628" /> 
    <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Gabelkoppler-2-mm-50-mA-30-V-20-mA--25-%2B85-%C2%B0C-Omron-EE-SX1018/p/17540628" /> 
  </url>

2) Url pattern
http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L1D_idcat :96 Found, 24 unique (to check)
http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2D_idcat : 0 Found (NOK)
http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L2-3D_idcat : 0 Found (NOK)
http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-L3D_idcat : 15 Found (NOK)
http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-DC-idcat : 162810 found, divided by 4 alternate = 40702, divided by 4 language = 10175 (weird, to check)
http://www.distrelec.ch/lang/*/c/cat-idcat : 344161 found, divided by 4 alternate = 86040, divided by 4 language = 21510 (weird, to check)
http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/* : 0 Found (NOK)
http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/product-id : 1771344 Found, divided by 4 alternate = 442836, divided by 4 language = 110709 (NOK, expected to be ~165K)

Hi Pierre,
with the current version i've fixed the product name with the right language.
The sitemaps inside http://test.a.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml are not available (404 or 500).

Test on sample 5000 products :

200 : 4719 (95%)
404 : 37 (0.1%) (no pattern)
301 : 243 (5%) (redirected to EOL : 32, redirected to rewritten product content with the same pid : 211 (difference is encoding of non encoded "-" in sitemap))

Test on sample 5000 category

200 : 4719 (95%)
404 : 0
301 : 263 (5%) (redirected to rewritten product content with the same pid (difference is encoding of non encoded "-" in sitemap))

1 minor encoding issue found on sitemap :
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Universal-housing-222-x-125-x-81-mm-silver-grey-RAL-7001-Aluminium-Fibox-ALN-122208-COMPLETE/p/15001789
=301>
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Universal-housing-222-x-125-x-81-mm-silver-grey-%28RAL-7001%29-Aluminium-Fibox-ALN-122208-COMPLETE/p/15001789

  • How it is wrote on sitemaps :
    strreplace((url), "all special char", "-")
  • How it is wrote on the website :
    strreplace((urlencode(url)), "%20", "-")

This is a minor issue, it can go live with it

1 major issue found on the content :
(related to https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5474)
Inside the test sitemap we provide : (xdefault url content = language content of origin page, here it's english content)

sitemap in q
<url>
	<loc>http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Enclosures-Fans-PCB-Boards/19-Enclosures/U-Profiles/U-Profiles%2C-with-Cut-out-for-Micro-Switch/c/cat-579171</loc>
	<lastmod>2014-10-27</lastmod>
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Geh%C3%A4use-L%C3%BCfter-Leiterplatten/19---Anlagen/U-Profile/U-Profile%2C-mit-Ausschnitt-f%C3%BCr-Mikroschalter/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Bo%C3%AEtiers-Ventilateurs-Circuits-imprim%C3%A9s/Bo%C3%AEtiers-19-/U-Profiles/Profils-en-U%2C-avec-d%C3%A9coupe-pour-microrupteur/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/Components/Enclosures-Fans-PCB-Boards/19-Enclosures/U-Profiles/U-Profiles%2C-with-Cut-out-for-Micro-Switch/c/cat-579171" />
</url>

What we need : (use the shop defaut language as the xdefault language for content, here it's german)

sitemap we need
<url>
	<loc>http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Enclosures-Fans-PCB-Boards/19-Enclosures/U-Profiles/U-Profiles%2C-with-Cut-out-for-Micro-Switch/c/cat-579171</loc>
	<lastmod>2014-10-27</lastmod>
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="de" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Geh%C3%A4use-L%C3%BCfter-Leiterplatten/19---Anlagen/U-Profile/U-Profile%2C-mit-Ausschnitt-f%C3%BCr-Mikroschalter/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="fr" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/fr/Composants/Bo%C3%AEtiers-Ventilateurs-Circuits-imprim%C3%A9s/Bo%C3%AEtiers-19-/U-Profiles/Profils-en-U%2C-avec-d%C3%A9coupe-pour-microrupteur/c/cat-579171" />
		<xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="http://test.a.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/Geh%C3%A4use-L%C3%BCfter-Leiterplatten/19---Anlagen/U-Profile/U-Profile%2C-mit-Ausschnitt-f%C3%BCr-Mikroschalter/c/cat-579171" />
</url>

This is a major problem, going live with it will impact the quality of the structure

1 minor issue on <last mod> tag for categories :
this tag contain bad data.
The tag <last mod> is an optional instruction, it's better to have it with correct data but if the implementation is to hard, we can remove it.

(<last mod> tag on /c/ removed)

Crawl result on a random 500 url of all sitemaps of the last version :

40% of 301, that's really bad, this issue at 5% was minor at 40% it's critic
And it's only about the encoding issue
encoding issue.xlsx
http://www.diffnow.com/?report=8ipfg

4 pattern of 301 :

  • Majuscules difference (manufacturer)
  • Encoding difference (global) (we need, urlencode, then replace "%20" to "-")
  • Missing information (manufacturer on products url)
  • no lang on xdefault (normal) (global)

It's to late to add this functionnality and deploy,
We will do this week 45.

Manufacturer error :
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Diode-Zener-DO-41-plastique-120-V-2-W---ZY120/p/17006490
=301>
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Diode-Zener-DO-41-plastique-120-V-2-W-Diotec-ZY120/p/17006490

in french and english the brand doesn't work
http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/diotec/man_dio)

Majuscule error :
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/manufacturer/Bilsom/man_bsm
=301>
http://www.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/bilsom/man_bsm

Encoding error :
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Self-d-accumulation-20-mH-0-5-A-W%C3%BCrth-Elektronik-744821120/p/15857851
=301>
http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Self-d%27accumulation-20-mH-0-5-A-W%C3%BCrth-Elektronik-744821120/p/15857851

The sitemap has been temporary disabled in production with the following redirection rule:

#delete this line when the sitemap will be ready.
RewriteRule ^/sitemap.*$ / [R=302,L]

On quality the job has finally produced the right sitemap files.
you can access these files with this url:
http://test.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml

On production there is the same version as well, even if the tempoarary redirection rule is redirecting all the sitemap requests to home with 302.
But the sitemap file can be easly checked accessing this url:
http://10.191.20.141:9001/sitemap_index.xml?site=distrelec-ch

Please let me know if you find additional issues.

Francesco

In the next release v3.0.11 these changes will be available.

ok great news !
Tell me when it's deployed, I'll do a checkup.

Last days of email compiled here :

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Monday 20/11/14 :

checkup of the Monday sitemap :

  • Category :
    • Counts : OK
    • Counts alternate : OK

      • lign 21 : need replace of "---" by "-"
  • Products :
    • Counts : OK
    • Counts alternate : OK
    • Redirection : Optimizable, reduced from 60% (last sitemap) to 15%, it's great !
      here is the diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=71vbj

      -​ lign 43 : need replace of "---" by "-"
      • lign 55 : need replace of "-/-" by "-"
  • Manufacturer :
    • count : Ok
    • count alternate : Ok
    • redirection : Ok

---------------------------------------------------------
Wednesday 19/11/14 :

checkup of the Wednesday sitemap :

  • Here is the diff of the 301 found in my sample on category sitemap :
    http://www.diffnow.com/?report=6ex9d
  • patterns :
    • lign 35 : "-" instead of "--" (mainly on distrelec.ch/de) (25% of the 301)
    • lign 1 : redirection of the 0 language to the language (25% of the 301, not an issue, normal behavior)
  • Which make only 6% off undesired redirection !!!
    Just apply the same rule on product for encoding and we are good for a go live \o/
@Francesco : Did you moved forward ?

Last check on product as requested this morning :
still 16% of 301.
Here is the diff :
http://www.diffnow.com/?report=umcbw

  • lign 32 : need replace of "--" by "---"
  • lign 59 : need replace of "--" by "-"

    (only the 1st error is similar to monday)
On Q now.
@Francesco : can I get an export ?

@Francesco :

Check on production sitemap :

  • Manufacturer sitemap (100% of 404, on a random sample of 500) (nok):
    100% manufacturer destination url lead to a 404.
    exemples:

  • Product (16% of 301, on a random sample of 500) (ok, optimizable):
    diff :
    http://www.diffnow.com/?report=85jap
    • "/" sent, "-" expected,
    • "--" sent, "-" expected.

=> Sitemap not ready for Google :(

@Francesco :
Check on local sitemap :

  • Manufacturer (99% of 200 on a sample of 1k of url) (ok)
  • Category (55% of 301 on a sample of 1k of url) (nok)
    • diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=qeuwz
    • patterns :
      • "--" expected, "-" sent (lign 34)

  • Product (60% of 301 on a sample of 1k of url) (nok)

      • missing product title data
      • missing brand data

=> Not ready for Google, but issues could be related to local environnement

Ok, code commited,
will be available in Q at next deploy.
When will it be deployed on Q ?

it's currently on Q.
The sitemap generation is runnning

@Francesco :
Check on Q sitemap :

  • Category (99% of 200 on a random sample of 1k of url) (ok)
  • Product (15% of 301 on a random sample of 1k of url) (ok)

=> Ready for Google on Hidden Prod

good news.
i'll inform you when the release will be in prod.

@Francesco :
Check on Q sitemap coutn of products :

Manufacturer : 1265
Category : 41222
Product : 165000

Exact number on product, it's strange. You should check.

@Francesco :

Check on Hidden Production Sitemap :

Count :

  • number of category : 41 233 (OK)
  • number of manufacturer : 1 291 (OK)
  • number of products : 180 000 (NOK, expecting ~170k, without an exact number)

Crawl :

  • crawl random sample 1k categories : (OK, 98% 200)
  • crawl random sample 1k manufacturer : (OK, 97% 200)
  • crawl random sample 1k products : (OK, 81% 200, optimizable)
    • diff : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=a5vyi
    • pattern diff :
      • "--" sent, expecting "-" (lign 136)
      • "/" sent, expecting "-" (lign 151)
      • "/-" sent, expecting "-" (lign 165)

@ Francesco :

I found another issue, 20% of the category url result into a "0 results page".
Are you using category level with product available or all category level without distinction ?
sample : http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/15785/sample%200%20result%20cat.txt

(Or It could be related to this not properly fixed issue : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5894)

@ Francesco :

  • Concerning the "0 results page" I have created another ticket about it.
    http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5960.
    This is the only clean way to deal with it from the SEO point of view.
  • For the sitemap, the quick win would be to leave it like it is, and I provide you an exclusion list of the category I don't want (easy to generate for me, easy to exclude for you).

@ Francesco :
New issue found :
On category sitemap 100% of cat-L* have a 404 due to a little mistake, "-" is sent but "_" is expected :
Exemple :
Url provided : http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Printrelais/c/cat-L3D-525370
Url expected : http://www.distrelec.ch/Komponenten/Relais-%26-Schalter/Printrelais/c/cat-L3D_525370

Seen with Francesco, it's been corrected

Seen with Francesco, Bugged pages inside sitemaps excludable with a blacklist.
Subtask here : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5969
Once the "180k of product" issue & "_" fix deployed, we will be able to show it for google (blacklist for mid December/January).

Hi Pierre
The blacklist is implemented, will be available with v3.1.7 release.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6005] Empty shopping lists show (1)
item.description:
Issue
Empty shopping-lists show always up as they would have one product in it. Please fix.

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5925] CH - Orderconfirmation mail
item.description: Please change the bg-color of the button to red. thx.
